item.title: [ARVIND] Arvind Ltd Announces New Leadership Chapter: Susheel Kaul to Step Down as MD & President - Textiles
item.description:
Arvind Ltd, a leading textile and apparel manufacturing company, has announced a significant leadership change. Susheel Kaul, the current MD and President of the textiles and apparel business, will step down from his role. He will be relieved from his duties with effect from close of business hours on March 31, 2026. Kaul will be replaced by Punit Lalbhai, the Vice Chairman of the company, who will take over the textiles and apparel business as part of the company's long-term succession plan. Kaul will continue in his role as MD and will take up key strategic projects, working closely with the management to shape the future growth initiatives of the group.

  • Susheel Kaul to step down as MD & President - Textiles at Arvind Ltd
  • Punit Lalbhai, Vice Chairman, to take over as head of textiles and apparel business
  • Kaul to continue in his role as MD and take up key strategic projects
  • Change is part of the company's long-term succession plan
  • Effective from April 1, 2026

item.title: [AHCL] Anlon Healthcare Completes 67.48% Acquisition of Apiqo Organics
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Anlon Healthcare Ltd has successfully completed the acquisition of 67.48% equity shareholding of Apiqo Organics Private Limited (formerly known as M/s Apple Life Science, a partnership firm) as per the Share Purchase Agreement dated December 2, 2025. This acquisition makes Apiqo Organics a subsidiary of Anlon Healthcare Limited and is in compliance with Section 179 (3) (e) & (j) and all other applicable provisions of Companies Act, 2013. The investment details were previously disclosed on December 2, 2025, in accordance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, and SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated November 11, 2024.

  • Anlon Healthcare Ltd acquires 67.48% equity shareholding of Apiqo Organics Private Limited.
  • Apiqo Organics becomes a subsidiary of Anlon Healthcare Limited post-acquisition.
  • The acquisition is in compliance with Section 179 (3) (e) & (j) and all other applicable provisions of Companies Act, 2013.
  • Investment details were disclosed on December 2, 2025, as per SEBI regulations.
  • The acquisition is expected to bolster Anlon Healthcare's market presence and operations.

item.title: [CANFINHOME] Can Fin Homes Ltd to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and 9 Months of FY2025-26 on Jan 17, 2026
item.description:
Can Fin Homes Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on January 17, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The meeting will also approve the limited review report of the Joint Statutory Central Auditors for the same period. In compliance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window for dealing in the company's equity shares has been closed since January 01, 2026, and will reopen on January 20, 2026.

  • Can Fin Homes Ltd to approve unaudited financial results for Q3 and 9 months of FY2025-26 on January 17, 2026
  • The meeting will also approve the limited review report of the Joint Statutory Central Auditors
